title: Heads up to any future hacking victims, this is the only help you'll get from Riot.
body: After a week of playing ping-pong with tickets with Riot Support about my account being hacked and unjustly suspended, this was their final reply.

replies.body: Damn I just logged in to find my account had been hacked and banned :/ I sent a ticket but haven't heard back. I'll keep you posted what they do with me.

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/YQ4IrvNq-morality-poll

Have a vote fallen brother, i feel your pain and i am going to post on this again.
This is because it's a common excuse when it wasn't the case. You cannot blame Riot for your lack of ability to protect your account. You wouldn't be hacked if you didn't do sketchy things.
